nodes.text: The ZXK-100346 system was a star system located in the Outer Rim Territories. The sixth planet in the system was ZXK-100346.6a, and was the hiding place of a deadly dark side artifact, the Soulsaber. It was concealed there by ancient Jedi, and a map showing the location of the system was installed inside the Temples of Vormijj on Pamorjal. In 3 ABY, the Dark Jedi discovered the location of the system from the Temples and traveled there, in search of the Soulsaber.
